protocol.name: P-10522-10
protocol.text: Arabidopis thaliana ecotype Col-0 was grown on soil in a 12h light/12h dark cycle,at a light intensity of 130umol*m-2 s-1 and at a constant temperature of 20Â°C. At the age of 4 weeks plants were moved to 8C 4 hours into the light period.

protocol.name: P-10522-2
protocol.text: Arabidopis thaliana ecotype Col-0 was grown on soil in a 12h light/12h dark cycle,at a light intensity of 130umol*m-2 s-1 and at a constant temperature of 20Â°C. At the age of 4 weeks plants were moved to 20C 4 hours into the light period.

protocol.name: P-10522-3
protocol.text: Plants were harvested in the vegetative state with 3 rosettes per sample, and typically at least 5 replicate samples. Rosettes were transferred into liquid nitrogen 10h into the light period

protocol.name: P-10522-4
protocol.text: Approximately 10 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
